Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.MeterContext

  • Packages that use MeterContext 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts
    Contains METER and GAUGE charts implementations (based on controllers), available out-of-the box.

    • Uses of MeterContext in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts that return MeterContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) MeterContext MeterOptions.getContext()
      Returns the scriptable context for callbacks, creating it if does not exist.
      It's called from BaseMeterController.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts that return types with arguments of type MeterContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ColorCallback<MeterContext> AbstractMeterElement.getColorCallback()
      Returns the callback to customize the font color for rendered label in the chart.
      FontCallback<MeterContext> AbstractMeterElement.getFontCallback()
      Returns the callback to customize the font for rendered label in the chart.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts with parameters of type MeterContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private String BaseMeterController.getColor​(AbstractMeterElement options, String defaultValue, MeterContext context)
      Returns the color to apply to rendered label, invoking the callback if set.
      private String BaseMeterController.getContent​(DescriptionLabel options, MeterContext context)
      Returns the content of the description label of the chart.
      private FontItem BaseMeterController.getFont​(AbstractMeterElement options, MeterContext context)
      Returns the font to apply to rendered label, invoking the callback if set.
      private String BaseMeterController.getFormattedValue​(ValueLabel options, MeterContext context)
      Returns a formatted value of the chart applying the precision or invoking the value callback.
      Method parameters in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts with type arguments of type MeterContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbstractMeterElement.setColor​(ColorCallback<MeterContext> colorCallback)
      Sets the callback to customize the font color for rendered label in the chart.
      void AbstractMeterElement.setFont​(FontCallback<MeterContext> fontCallback)
      Sets the callback to customize the font for rendered label in the chart.
